data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Bordeaux have been awarded a corner by Karim Abed.
In the minute 4, Corner awarded to Bordeaux.
Angers awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bordeaux to take a throw-in in Angers territory.
In the minute 6, Goal kick for Bordeaux at Stade Raymond Kopa.
Karim Abed signals a Angers throw-in in Bordeaux's half.
Throw-in for Angers in the half of Bordeaux.
In the minute 8, Ball goes out of play for a Bordeaux goal kick.
Throw-in for Angers in their own half.
Corner awarded to Angers.
In the minute 11, In Angers, Angers push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Karim Abed signals a free kick to Bordeaux in their own half.
Bordeaux's Josh Maja is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 14, Bordeaux have been awarded a corner by Karim Abed.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Angers get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bordeaux's half?
In the minute 17, Bordeaux's Nicolas De Preville gets in a shot on goal at Stade Raymond Kopa. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Bordeaux have been awarded a corner by Karim Abed.
In Angers a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 21, Can Angers get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bordeaux's half?
Can Bordeaux capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Corner awarded to Bordeaux.
In the minute 25, Goal! Josh Maja gives Bordeaux a 0-1 lead.
Laurent Koscielny with an assist there.
Free kick for Angers in their own half.
In the minute 27, Goal! Toma Basic extends Bordeaux's lead to 0-2.
Angers drive upfield and Sada Thioub gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Bordeaux defender.
Corner awarded to Angers.
In the minute 29, Angers have been awarded a corner by Karim Abed.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
The match at Stade Raymond Kopa has been interrupted briefly for a check on Toma Basic, who is down injured.
In the minute 33, Bordeaux's Toma Basic looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Karim Abed signals a Angers throw-in in Bordeaux's half.
Karim Abed signals a free kick to Angers just outside Bordeaux's area.
In the minute 36, Corner awarded to Angers.
Karim Abed signals a free kick to Angers in their own half.
Angers awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 37, Remi Oudin (Bordeaux) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Throw-in high up the field for Bordeaux in Angers.
Free kick for Bordeaux in their own half.
In the minute 42, Can Angers capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bordeaux's half?
Free kick for Bordeaux in their own half.
Throw-in for Bordeaux at Stade Raymond Kopa.
In the minute 45, Free kick Angers.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Karim Abed blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
Ball safe as Bordeaux is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Angers awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 48, Bordeaux have a goal kick.
Karim Abed awards the away team a throw-in.
Karim Abed signals a free kick to Bordeaux in their own half.
In the minute 51, Throw-in for Bordeaux in the half of Angers.
Bordeaux to take a throw-in in Angers territory.
Wilfried Kanga for Angers gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 52, Karim Abed awards Bordeaux a goal kick.
Free kick for Angers in the half of Bordeaux.
Youssouf Sabaly for Bordeaux has been booked by Karim Abed and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 55, Bordeaux awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Bordeaux drives forward and Hwang Ui-Jo gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Karim Abed signals a free kick to Bordeaux in their own half.
In the minute 57, It's a goal kick for the home team in Angers.
Throw-in Bordeaux.
Bordeaux awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 60, Ball safe as Bordeaux is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Angelo Fulgini (Angers) strikes at Stade Raymond Kopa but his header is cleared.
Angelo Fulgini of Angers smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 65, Karim Abed signals a free kick to Angers.
Toma Basic (Bordeaux) has received a first yellow card.
Pierrick Capelle is on a sub for Farid El Melali for Angers.
In the minute 66, Jean-Louis Gasset is making the team's first substitution at Stade Raymond Kopa with Jimmy Briand replacing Josh Maja.
The home team replace Wilfried Kanga with Stephane Bahoken.
Bordeaux pushes forward through Hwang Ui-Jo, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 67, Free kick for Angers in their own half.
Hwang Ui-Jo for Bordeaux is whistled offside.
Throw-in for Bordeaux in the half of Angers.
In the minute 75, Angers to take a throw-in in Bordeaux territory.
Angers drives forward and Abdoulaye Bamba gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Angers.
In the minute 78, Samuel Kalu is replacing Hwang Ui-Jo for Bordeaux at Stade Raymond Kopa.
Jean-Louis Gasset (Bordeaux) is making a third substitution, with Ruben Pardo replacing Nicolas De Preville.
Throw-in Angers.
Bordeaux awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 81, Angers make their third substitution with Antonin Bobichon replacing Thomas Mangani.
The home team have replaced Sada Thioub with Mohamed Ali Cho. This is the fourth substitution made today by Stephane Moulin.
In the minute 83, Karim Abed signals a free kick to Bordeaux in their own half.
Free kick for Angers in the half of Bordeaux.
Free kick for Bordeaux in their own half.
In the minute 84, At Stade Raymond Kopa, Baptiste Santamaria has been yellow-carded for the home team.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Karim Abed signals a Bordeaux throw-in in Angers's half.
In the minute 86, Can Bordeaux get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Angers's half?
Karim Abed awards Angers a goal kick.
Stephane Bahoken gets his shot on target but fails to score for Angers.
In the minute 88, Stephane Bahoken (Angers) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Angers have been awarded a corner by Karim Abed.
Throw-in for Angers close to the penalty box.
In the minute 88, Bordeaux have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Bordeaux.
Angers awarded a free kick in their own half.
Karim Abed signals a free kick to Bordeaux in their own half.
Bordeaux to take a throw-in in Angers territory.
Free kick in a good position for Bordeaux!
Angers's Baptiste Santamaria misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Bordeaux goal kick.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Bordeaux have been awarded a corner by Karim Abed.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-2.
Maxime Poundje is replacing Remi Oudin for the away team.
The home team have replaced Angelo Fulgini with Lassana Coulibaly. This is the fifth substitution made today by Stephane Moulin.
